decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to quickly generate mana with cards like Desperate Ritual, Pyretic Ritual, and Ruby Medallion to play powerful spells and combo pieces like Grapeshot. The deck also utilizes cantrips like Manamorphose and Reckless Impulse to dig for key cards, while cards like Wrenn's Resolve and Valakut Awakening help with card advantage and deck manipulation. Ral, Monsoon Mage is used as a win condition to deal damage to the opponent, while Wish provides additional versatility in accessing sideboard cards. The deck aims to quickly assemble its combo pieces to overwhelm the opponent and win the game.

This aggressive Red Deck Wins archetype focuses on dealing damage quickly and efficiently to the opponent. The deck relies on low-cost burn spells like Lightning Bolt, Lava Spike, and Rift Bolt, as well as efficient creatures like Chandra's Incinerator and Iridescent Vinelasher to quickly reduce the opponent's life total. The deck also includes cards like Skullcrack to prevent the opponent from gaining life and Searing Blaze to control the board. With a focus on fast damage and quick wins, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent before they have a chance to stabilize.

The deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly to play powerful Eldrazi creatures and control the board with cards like Malevolent Rumble. It also includes utility cards like Karn, the Great Creator and All Is Dust to deal with threats. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with big creatures like Emrakul, the Promised End and World Breaker while maintaining control over the game through disruption and large threats. The mana base is built around Eldrazi Temple and various lands to support the colorless mana requirements of the Eldrazi creatures.
